**Behinderte Menschen**, deren Grad der: Impaired persons whose level of disability does not only temporarily amount to at least 80 and who are constantly unable to partake in public events due to their suffering. They have been granted the RF mark.
**Blinde** oder **nicht nur vorübergehen: **Blind** or **not only temporarily visually impaired persons** with a degree of disablity of at least 60 who were granted the **mark "RF"** only due to their visual impairment.
**Hörgeschädigte Menschen**, die gehörlo: **hearing-impaired persons** who are deaf or who are unable to sufficiently communicate aurally with hearing aides and were granted the **mark "RF"** due to their impairment.
**Sonderfürsorgeberechtigte** im Sinne d: **Pesons entitled to special care** according to § 27e Bundesversorgungsgesetz (Federal Law on war pensions - BVG).
**Volljährige**, die im Rahmen einer Lei: Young adults receiving youth welfare assistance under SGB VIII and living in a residential home for young adults under section 45 SGB VIII
Behinderte Menschen mit einem Grad der B: Blind or visually impaired persons with a degree of disability of at least 80:
Bei Anspruch auf eine Befreiung von der: If you want to apply for an exemption from or reduction of the fee, you need to fill in an online form. The form will guide you through the application process. You do not need to file a separate application form.
Blinde oder sehbehinderte Menschen mit e: Blind or visually impaired persons with a degree of disability of at least 60:
Die 9-stellige Beitragsnummer (früher Te: You will find the 9-digit-subscription number (formerly named user number) on your registration form, your account statement or the payment request.
Die Einkommensüberschreitung liegt unter: Do you exceed the limit of necessity by less than 17,50€?
Eine Ermäßigung des Rundfunkbeitrags ist: You are only eligible for a reduction of the broadcasting fee, if you were granted the mark "RF". Since you were not granted the mark "RF", your request cannot be processed further.
Empfänger von **Ausbildungsförderung** n: Recipients of **educational funding** as per the Bundesausbildungsförderungsgesetz (BAföG, Federal Training Assistance Act) who do **not** live with their parents.
Empfänger von **Ausbildungsgeld** nach §: Recipients of educational assistance for disabled people under sections 104 following SGB III who are **not** living with their parents
Empfänger von **Berufsausbildungsbeihilf: Recipients of **Berufsausbildungsbeihilfe** (BAB, Vocational training assistance) under sections 114, 115 No. 2 SGB III or chapter 3, paragraph 3, sub-paragraph 3 SGB III who are **not** living with their parents
Empfänger von **Grundsicherung im Alter: Recipients of **basic pension for the elderly or disabled** (Chapter 4 SGB XII)
Empfänger von **Hilfe zum Lebensunterhal: Recipients of "**social benefits** under SGB XII or sections 27a, 27 d BVG
Empfänger von **Hilfe zur Pflege** nach: Recipients of home care assistance under chapter 7 SGB XII, or home care assistance as a service of the assistance for victims of war crimes BVG, or home care funds as per national regulations.
Empfänger von **Pflegezulagen** nach § 2: Recipients of maintenance assistance under section 267 subsection 1 LAG or persons in need of care who receive an allowance under section267 sub-section 2 sentence 1 no. 2 letter c LAG.
Empfänger von **Sozialgeld oder Arbeitsl: Recipients of **Sozialgeld (...) or Arbeitslosengeld II (Unemployment benefits)** including benefits under section 22 of SGB II
Empfänger von BAB können von der Rundfun: If you receive "BAB", you can only be exempted, if you are **not** living with your parents. If you **are** living with your parents, you cannot get an exemption.
Empfänger von Blindenhilfe nach § 72 des: Recipients of aid to the blind under section 72 SGB XII or section 27d BVG
Empfänger von Leistungen nach dem **Asyl: Recipients of benefits under **Asylbewerberleistungsgesetz** (AsylblG, Law for the Assistance of Asylum Seekers)
Falls Sie bereits bei uns angemeldet sin: If you are already registered with us, please check if you are entitled to de-registration. For further information, click here.
Ich habe auf Grund einer Einkommensübers: Because I exceed the limit of necessity, I am not entilted to any of the benefits listed in section 4 sub-section 1, No. 1 to 10 RBStV,
Ich möchte befreit werden, weil ich eine: I am applying for an exemption becuase I receive one of the following benefits
Ich möchte befreit werden, weil ich kein: I apply for an exemption, because I am not entitled to any of the benefits listed in section 4 sub-section 1, No. 1 to 10 RBStV,
Ich möchte befreit werden, weil ich zu e: I would like to request a reduction of the broadcasting fees because I belong to the following group of persons:
I am applying for an exemption or reduction for the following reasons (please tick)
Ich möchte eine Ermäßigung des Rundfunkb: I would like to request a reduction of the broadcasting fees because I belong to the following group of persons:
Ich wohne bei meinen Eltern?: I am living with my parents
Personen, denen eine der in § 4 Abs. 1 N: Persons **failed by one of **the social services** defined in § 4 para 1 no. 1-10 of the Rundfunkbeitragsstaatsvertrag (interstate treaty on broadcasting and telemedia)**by exceeding the limit of necessity**, whereby such excess is **lower** than the amount of the broadcasting subscription.
Sie sind bereits mit einer Wohnung angem: Are you already registered with an address?*
Taubblindheit im Sinne des Rundfunkbeitr: According to the broadcasting fee state contract, deafblindess is given when the good ear of an impaired person suffers from a "severe to profound hearing loss" and the good eye of this person is "severly visually impaired".
Um das Formular anzuzeigen, benötigen Si: You need the pdf-reader to fill in the form
Wenn Sie keine soziale Leistung wegen Ei: Because you exceed the limit of necessity by more than 17,50€, you are not entitled to an exemption.
Wurde Ihnen das Merkzeichen \"RF\" zuerk: Have you been granted the mark "RF"?
auf Grund einer Einkommensüberschreitung: as my income exceeds the limit of necessity
